trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Lewisville
There were no other sightings in Lewisville on or around January 8th 2008
Summary: heard a boomerang-fizzling sound, looked up to see a fireball from ESE to WNW
divs: sighting detailsi was standing in my backyard, dog with me, when i heard a boomerang type noise with a fizzle. i immediately looked up and saw a yellow\white softball size "meteorite" travelling from the ese to the wnw as fast as any other "meteorite" i've seen over the years, only this one stayed lit longer (8 sec.) and "i actually heard it" and it was a lot closer to earth. i immediately looked at my watch to record the time (9:48pm) and looked and listened to see if there was an impact close by....there was none. i immediately called my father-in-law and told him what i just witnessed. it was a unique experience, i thought, until i heard on cnn today that some folks from stephenville, tx thought they saw a ufo. i am 100% positive that the people of stephenville saw the "meteorite" breaking up as it was falling to ground. iwould suspect that you should be able to find the meteorite not too far to the wnw of that area, if you belive the person that said it was 300 feet up.??
